This page lists notable '''[[fantasy]] [[novel]]s''' (and novel series). The books appear in alphabetical order by title (beginning with A to H) (ignoring "A", "An", and "The"); series are alphabetical by author-designated name or, if there is no such, some reasonable designation. [[List of science fiction novels|Science-fiction novels]] and [[List of fantasy story collections|short-story collections]] are not included here.
